holidays.title: Anniversary of the Revolution of the King and the People
Hungary National Day
holidays.description: Why is today so important to Hungarians? Let’s do a cultural and historical deep dive.

holidays.title: National Bacon Lovers Day
holidays.description: Chomp, chomp, it’s crispy bacon o’clock. Grab some honey, and get your bacon on, bacon lover.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Pecan Pie Day
holidays.description: Chocolate pecan pie is a staple in cookbooks and on restaurant menus around the globe.

holidays.title: National Radio Day
holidays.description: Radio is far from dead and increasingly appreciated for its vintage and fantastic content.

holidays.title: St. Stephen’s Day Hungary
holidays.description: St. Stephen’s Day is an official holiday of Hungary that celebrates the foundation of the state.

holidays.title: World Mosquito Day
holidays.description: More than just annoying summertime pests, mosquitoes are also responsible for spreading malaria.

holidays.title: Andrew Garfield’s Birthday
holidays.description: This “Amazing Spider-Man,” has garnered respect in Hollywood for his brilliant portrayals.

holidays.title: Ben Barnes’s Birthday
holidays.description: This driven actor and singer has a heart as big and amazing as his talents.

holidays.title: Demi Lovato’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this well-rounded award-winning singer, actress, and businesswoman, nothing is impossible. Celebrate her today!

holidays.title: DJ Blizzard’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today we focus on this DJ and TikTok star who dishes out excellent musical recommendations.

holidays.title: Fred Durst’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this rapper-filmmaker whose success is due to his unwavering dedication to his trade

holidays.title: HP Lovecraft’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented novelist, overcoming fear and his struggles meant breaking all boundaries and succeeding.

holidays.title: Meme Bouquet’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meme Bouquet is the DJ you want at your party to keep everyone on the dance floor.

holidays.title: Misha Collins’s Birthday
holidays.description: For Collins, reaching new heights has been but one successful leap of faith and effort.

holidays.title: Mitch Trubisky’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mitch Trubisky is the missing piece the Steelers needed to shine again.

holidays.title: Prettyboyfredo’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube star is creating his success one upload at a time.

holidays.title: Robert Plant’s Birthday
holidays.description: For Robert Plant, the experienced and passionate vocalist and songwriter, music is life!
